about.details:
Incorporated in 1994, Share India Securities Ltd is engaged in providing brokerage services for securities. The Company offers equity trading, futures and options, currency and commodity derivatives, mutual funds, IPO, and depository services.

They are in the business of Share broking and trading services in Equity, Future& Options and Currency Derivatives segments and has the membership in the cash, future and options and currency derivatives segments of both BSE and NSE, Depository Participant services with CDSL and is also providing Mutual fund investment services to clients. Apart from the above they have also entered into proprietary trading (own account trading) activities also.

SISL got registered with SEBI as Stock Broker (Member of BSE) in the year 2000 and started the Stock Brokering operations. Later during the year 2007-08 they got registered as a trading and clearing member of Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). Post the merger of the company it got registered with SEBI as Stock Broker, Trading and Clearing Member of National Stock Exchange of India (NSE) in the year 2012. With the introduction of the Future and option segment into the Indian capital market the company became Member under future & Option (F&O) Segment as well.

contactDetails.full_address: Share India Securities Ltd, 6th Milestone New Bhai-Chara Complex, Opp Mata Man dir Chikambarpur, ahibabad Ghaziabad - 201006

faqs.question: What is the Share India Securities IPO?
faqs.answer:
Share India Securities IPO is a SME IPO of 6432000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹26.37 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹41 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on September 21, 2017, and closes on September 26, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Share India Securities IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Share India Securities IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Share India Securities IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Share India Securities IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Share India Securities IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Share India Securities IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Share India Securities IPO opens on September 21, 2017 and closes on September 26, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Share India Securities IPO?
faqs.answer: Share India Securities IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,23,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Share India Securities IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Share India Securities IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
